ygData.subject: Re: Charm Morph Bug
ygData.msgSnippet: Basically this is a bug where if you get charmed by an NPC and have in your primary melee hand a non melee weapon and actually get forced to attempt to attack
ygData.messageBody:
Basically this is a bug where if you get charmed by an NPC and have in your
primary melee hand a non melee weapon and actually get forced to attempt to
attack anything the item has a 90% chance of morhping. Eg: Najenas Book
turns into Tailor Kit, Jeweled Skull turns into Runed Circlet.

It only effects non-weapons.

Baels

----- Original Message -----
From: Farr, Robert <Robert.Farr@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, August 20, 1999 12:06 AM
Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Stein - No more


> From: "Farr, Robert" <Robert.Farr@...>
>
> On the enchanter board, Baelish references a charm/morph item bug. Does
> anyone have details on this one?
>

> > This is total BS. Players spent their entire savings and traded away
> > lots of equipment to get a left hand holdable Int item which is now
> > going to turn in to a melee-hand-only item. Why do we even play this
> > game anymore? Verant is going to get a bill for my time wasted on a
> > now useless item. 7/43? What a joke!
> >
> > Q
> >
> > --- "baelish.aust.com" <eq@...> wrote:
